content: @David Thrane Christiansen, I opened https://github.com/leanprover/verso/pull/462, but I can't rebase merge this... If you're available could you take a look and advise what I did wrong. For now I'm going to proceed on different branches of the release process. :-)
Oh, I failed to read your message on the other Zulip.
I'm going to assume that still holds, and I will squash merge verso#462.
That was the right thing to do - thanks!
